thread.title: Adele stuns in gorgeous green gown as she leads red carpet arrivals at the 2017 Grammy Awards
thread.title_full: Adele stuns in gorgeous green gown as she leads red carpet arrivals at the 2017 Grammy Awards

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Adele stuns in gorgeous green gown as she leads red carpet arrivals at the 2017 Grammy Awards
text:
Adele stuns in gorgeous green gown as she leads red carpet arrivals at the 2017 Grammy Awards Some of the biggest names in the music business are expected at this year's celebration Share Gorgeous in green: Adele (Photo: REUTERS) Share Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing! Could   
The red carpet has finally been rolled out for the 59th annual Grammy Awards and the stars haven't failed to disappoint with their dazzling wardrobe choices this year. 
British vocal powerhouse Adele, 28, was one of the first to arrive at the Staples Center in Downtown Los Angeles on Sunday. 
We're used to seeing the singer in black or red, but the Hello star opted for a gorgeous long green Givenchy couture gown that perfectly complimented her hair colour and flawless make-up. 
Bringing out some serious glamour, country megastar Carrie Underwood also wowed in an embellished red Elie Madi gown that featured a sexy, deep thigh split running up the middle. (Photo: REUTERS) (Photo: REUTERS) (Photo: REUTERS) 
Former Fifth Harmony beauty Camila Cabello went down the fairy princess route with her silver gown that was adorned with patches of purple, while Paris Jackson was also flashing her legs in a thigh split frock. 
On the night, Adele faces tought competition from superstar Beyonce with the pair going head-to-head for album, track of the year and song of the year. 
They'll also both be performing on stage, alongside the likes of John Legend, Demi Lovato, Lady Gaga, Kay Perry, The Weeknd and Daft Punk, Chance The Rapper and more. (Photo: Rex Features)
